officialTitle: A Phase 1, Open Label Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of AZD2171 and Selected Chemotherapy Regimens When Given in Combination to Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
inclusionCriteria:
* histologically confirmed metastatic cancer that is not amenable to surgery or radiation therapy with curative intent
* measurable lesion by CT or other techniques according to RECIST
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Inadequate bone marrow reserve
* history of poorly controlled hypertension
